name: Gambler's Soul
description:
Gambler's Soul is a Turn-based, Japanese-Styled RPG, where you play as the Swordsman Lucas, Gunner Frederick, and Thief Reni, as they use the elemental power of the Gambler's Soul engine to defeat the rogue elementals that have been attacking nearby towns and cities.

Originally created as an university submission.

Demo shows up to the first dungeon boss, but doesn't "end" persay, simply doesn't continue the storyline.
